section.title: Purpose
section.p: EQFGETPROP retrieves the selected proposal and copies it to the provided buffer.
EQF_UP or EQF_DOWN scrolls the contents of the window in the selected direction, if possible. EQF_UP and EQF_DOWN are defined in the file EQFTWBS.H.

plentry.pd: The number of the selected proposal or match (0...9, EQF_UP, EQF_DOWN).
The buffer for the proposals. It must have a length of EQF_BUFFERLEN. EQF_BUFFERLEN is defined in the file EQFTWBS.H.
The pointer to the variable for the return match level.

dlentry.dd: The selected proposal is not available.
The selected proposal is available and copied into the provided buffer.
The system must first be initialized.

section.title: Remarks
section.p: If the selected proposal is not available, a warning message is issued and the appropriate return code is set.
